name.title: The Name Schema
name.description: This contains the first name of the user

surname.title: The Surname Schema
surname.description: This will have the last name of the user

subject.title: The Subject Schema
subject.description: This contains the subject line chosen by the user

email.title: The Email Schema
email.description: This will have the email ID input by the user

message.title: The Message Schema
message.description: Contains the long message text from the user
